title: Altar Frontal, 16th–17th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: withdrawn element; bobbin lace
description: Heavy linen altar frontal with a wide border showing a large-scale design of blossoms or pomegranates within curving circular bands reserved in linen. Narrow border of simple strapwork in the same technique. Edging of heavy bobbin lace in a scalloped design.

tombstone.epitaph:
Altar Frontal, 16th–17th century.Medium: linen
Technique: withdrawn element; bobbin lace. 1952-162-127.
